original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena upāsakā bhikkhunisaṅghassa cīvaratthāya chandakaṁ saṅgharitvā aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṁ nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena upāsakāḥ bhikkhuni saṅghassa cīvara tthāya chandakam saṅgharitvā aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāram nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ upasaṅkamitvā etat avocu

original: “amukassa, ayye, pāvārikassa ghare cīvaratthāya parikkhāro nikkhitto, tato cīvaraṁ āharāpetvā bhājethā”ti.
analyzed: amukassa ayye pāvārikassa ghare cīvara atthāya parikkhāraḥ nikkhitto tatas cīvaram āharāpetvā bhājetha ati

original: Bhikkhuniyo tena parikkhārena bhesajjaṁ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṁsu.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ tena parikkhārena bhesajjam cetāpetvā paribhuñjisu

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṁ cetāpessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññam cetāpessanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ upāsakānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam upāsakānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṁ cetāpessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññam cetāpessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṁ cetāpentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññam cetāpenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṁ cetāpessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññam cetāpessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṁ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññam cetāpeyya nissaggiyam pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
saṅghassa na gaṇassa na eka bhikkhuniyā

original: yaṁatthāya dinnaṁ, taṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā eka bhikkhuniyā vā

original: “idaṁ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṁ cetāpitaṁ nissaggiyaṁ, imāhaṁ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti.
analyzed: idam me ayye aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññam cetāpitam nissaggiye imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti

original: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññadatthike aññadatthika saññā aññam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññadatthike vematikā aññam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññadatthike anaññadatthika saññā aññam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya
